title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface as Python.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, Chat, and Embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama—chat, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoint.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenient interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions & chat.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions; sync/async, streaming, and embedding APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST API; supports generate, chat, pull, and embeddings.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team; use local models as Generator, Chat, or Embedder in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) plus docker-compose examples for easy server deployment.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop client (Tauri + React) for chatting and managing Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama; supports .NET 6+, async streaming, and dependency injection.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama service containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG starter using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store; includes FastAPI backend & React UI.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to query Ollama models inside buffers—generate, refactor, or chat about code.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir wrapper with GenServer behavior for fault-tolerant Ollama interactions in Phoenix apps.

title: ollama-pkgs
summary: Community repository of unofficial packages (Alpine, Arch, Nix) and build scripts for Ollama.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot bringing local Ollama models to servers with slash commands and moderation.
